medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with sudden onset of upper abdominal pain after eating pizza today. The pain has been constant, worsening, and nonradiating. Previous similar pain episodes have occurred without a clear diagnosis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage III follicular lymphoma, obesity, vitamin D deficiency.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and diabetes mellitus, but no cancer per patient.
